title: Jing Chikka Jing Chikka Lyrics Veeram Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Jing Chikka
Singers: Pushpavanam Kuppusamy, Magizhini Manimaaran
Movie: Veeram
Music : Devi Sri Prasad
Lyrics: Viveka

Adiye thaarumaaraa thaavura mudhalu
en nenjukulla ninnukittu oodura visilu
Jing chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Kulichu kondapottu koovura kuyilu
en thandavaalam kandamaaga ottura railu
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Kurumbu payapulla, kurumbu payapulla
kenathukulla vandhu kappal vidaadha
thiruttu payapulla thiruttu payapulla
thorandha veetukulla kannam podaadha
un tholpatta mannalli pocketil
vachirukken kandukaama, kambi neettaadha

Maama ippadi konjudhey
yema ippadi minjura!!

Ayyayo aambala icevandi pola
ada ice vache ice vache
kavuthuduvaa girla
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Valadhu kannirukkum penoruthimela
ada idadhu kannu meyumappa
innoruthimela
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Pillayaar kovil kozhukatta pola
neyum kanna rendum vachirukka
kaluthukku mela
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Aduppu mela vacha paal chatti pola
ne pongura paathu paathu poonayachu moola
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Azhagu payapulla azhagu puyapula
 valaya virichittu kaathirukaadha
 un kaal vella kai vella
paathadhum peche varala
....

ayyo pechu moochillaa kedakkaan
yedhavudhu paathu seyen..

Vaayilla poochinu paavapatta pochi
ivan muttakannu katti vachi
keechiduvaan keechi
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Ora kannaala paakkura saaichi
idhu thappaana paarva
en dhaavani saatchi
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Sandhana saaraayam serndhitta kalava
un saayalil paathen di
yelu ettu nilava..
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Idupil sumakkira vaanavil valaiva
engeyum paakalye ippadi patta alava..
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Kirukku payapulla kirukku payapula
kuruttu valiyila scene-a podaadha

Ye kaluvura meenula naluvura meenu
kaiyya vittu thulli podaadha
Adi kaena sirikki, un mansenna kalla

Manasil vachirukken ambuttu aasa
ada koocham vandhu thadukku
vaai vittu pesa..
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

Adiye,
usura pesaikkudhu nee sirikkum osai
unnavachi nenjikulla seyiren poosa.
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan
JIng chakkaa jing chakka jing chakka
jungidu chakkaan

seo.description: Get the complete Jing Chikka Jing Chikka Lyrics Veeram Song Lyrics from Veeram. Read the lyrics penned by Viveka and composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by Magizhini Manimaarran. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Viveka, Veeram, Devi Sri Prasad(DSP), Magizhini Manimaarran, Pushpavanam Kuppusamy, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
